verySoonYoWillBeAbleToAccumulateYouPoint: Very soon you will be able to accumulate your points
verySoonYouWillBeAbleToEarnMorePointsInT: Very soon you will be able to earn more points in the total of your purchase
verySoonYouWillBeAbleToAccumulatePurchas: Very soon you will be able to accumulate purchases and take gift products

login.title: Do your day-to-day operations wherever you are
login.terms_and_conditions: By continuing you acknowledge that you are of legal age, as well as having read and accepted our Terms and Conditions and our Privacy Notice

confirm_modal.title: Do you want to log out?
confirm_modal.subtitle: Remember that you can re-enter the app whenever you want

choose_brand.title: Choose the partner brand in which you want to use your points

form.description: Write the value of the points you want to change
form.description_with_shortcuts: Choose or write the value of the points you want to change
form.warning_minimum_amount: Remember that you need to have a minimum of {{currency}} in points to be able to change them with the brand you chose
form.input_minimum__hint: The minimum value you can redeem is {{amount}}
form.input_maximum_hint: The maximum value you can redeem is {{amount}}
